name: The Actors Platforming Game
description:
Hello guys and gals, BeBraveBeBoldStudios with another game titled "The Actors Platformer Game" 

The name "Actor" coming from a type of game I want to make in the future and the enemies will probably be called "Actors". 

This game doesn't have a devlog for it as the first game did ( I plan to bring those back after my 5th game is done, currently this is my 2nd ) but it has a lot more to do in terms of the first game. 

This is my second game made in Godot thanks to GDQuest and Godot First Game tutorial.

And if enjoyed this game, leave a like, follow and tell your friends for more.

If you want some content outside of ItchIO from me, check out these links: 

Main Channel ( Game Dev/ Level Design talk ): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu5DNCTzYolmJipbcJOWnMQ

Secondary Channel (Gameplay Streams, or just other funny content ): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgcsXV6SctDUiUdo8GWKc8Q

Mixer: https://mixer.com/HealthyHP

Games I Made: https://bebravebeboldstudios.itch.io/

Known Issues: 

Collisions are a bit busted, jumping on the enemy directly in front should kill them or somewhat closer. Sometimes jumping on them directly works but its busted.

If you die and press "Main Menu" button, and press "Play" again, just press ESC then Retry to unfreeze the game.
